ingredients.ingredient: 1 teaspoon cayenne pepper (add more if you can stand it)
salt and ground black pepper to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste

cookingTips: Pat wings dry before seasoning for crispier skin during baking
Warm honey mixture gently—high heat can separate butter and honey
Brush wings with hot honey glaze during the last few minutes of baking for better adherence
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Hot honey is trending for good reason—it balances heat with sweetness. How spicy do you like your food, and would you prefer guidance on adjusting the heat level or techniques for crisping the wings?
